newsitem.title: USA: Computer Associates new products available.
newsitem.headline: Computer Associates new products available.

text.p: Computer Associates International Inc said on Tuesday its new client/server extensions for its CA-PRMS and CA-Quick Response Engine platforms are now available.
The CA-PRMS is a manufacturing software platform for International Business Machines Corp's AS/400 client/servers, Computer Associates said.
The CA-Quick Response Engine is a $40,000 platform that is designed to run with CA-PRMS.

The extensions for engineering data management and BuyerCenter, a purchasing management tool, are free under Computer Associates contract maintenance and the graphical user interface carries a $3,000 one-time charge for unlimited use, a company spokesman said.
The price on the graphical user interface that is applicable for all CA-PRMS applications is expected to increase to $5,000 in 1997, the spokesman said.
